project_descr: The project provides an opportunity to strengthen local, provincial & national capacity to support local biodiversity conservation activities.

outputs.output_descr: The project will facilitate, adapt and strengthen local resource management initiatives by traditional landholders, chiefs and their communities and to strengthen local, provincial and national capacity to support local biodiversity conservation activities. The project will refine strategies to enable Vanuatu to achieve biodiversity conservation objectives given traditional land and resource ownership.
